bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, 700c Hybrid geometry, formed tubes, integrated kickstand mount, replaceable hanger

components.description: SR Suntour NEX-4110V2, alloy lower, Hi-Ten stanchions and steerer, coil/Mcu spring, preload adjust, 63mm travel
Ground Control adjustable rise, alloy head/quill, 2-bolt, 25.4mm clamp
Comfort riser bar, alloy, 60mm rise, 15-degree sweep, 25.4mm
Body Geometry Comfort w/ integrated bell, closed end, 132mm
Alloy 4-finger, Kraton lever for Rapidfire shifter
KMC Z8 w/ reusable Missing Link
Cartridge bearing, square spindle w/ crank stop right side, capless bolts
Comfort Pedal, composite body w/rubber top, sealed loose ball
Alloy double-wall, machined, pinned w/ eyelets, 32h
Double sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 17mm contact side, 5mm QR
Double sealed, ground race, dual lock nuts w/ 19mm contact side, 5mm QR
A-1 Suspension Seatpost, alloy, 27.2mm w/ 3.8mm spring
Chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owner's manual, rack mount extensions
